name: Hug Me I'm Cold (reizoukin, Aría)
description:
It's really cold. Do you ever want to put on a million sweaters?

Well be careful! The more you wear, the slower you move! You just...you got too many sweaters on! 

Try to find wood  and shelter  in the frozen tundra. Take it back to the campsite  before you freeze!

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Use F to pick up items, and F to drop them at the campsite again.
